com.wolvencraft.yasp.cmd

Class HelpCommand

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wolvencraft.yasp.cmd.HelpCommand
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BaseCommand

    public class HelpCommand
extends java.lang.Object
implements BaseCommand
    Help command.
    Gathers the help messages from all commands registered in the CommandManager and combines them in a single list for readability.
    Author:
    bitWolfy
